If things have changed to much ignore this post, I tried to send it out on =
friday. I guess I'm still having a few server problems.
  ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Satu=
rday, May 12, 2001 6:55 AM
  Subject: The world hasn't crumbled yet?


  OO=
C I'm back, miss me?

  I leave for a short time and the world falls apart,=
 guess I'll have to bring some superglue.

  BIC

  Bullet exits his quarte=
rs fully recharged and ready to do his duty. Even if his duty was to play n=
ursemaid to a lizard. Being sentenced to protect Chameleon was a fate worse=
 than death. The bull would've rather have faced a fireing squad than bear =
such indignity.

  Alarms sounded (Logically they'd go off since a virus ha=
d been released.) chiming the release of a dangerous material into the ship=
s atmosphere. Bullet checked the computer for Chameleons location. "Why am =
I not surprised?" he thought when he found that the bot he was to protect w=
as right in the middle of the action. He transformed to bull and rushed thr=
ough the halls toward the disturbance hoping the doors to that level hadn't=
 blocked it off to protect the rest of the ship.


    ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
    From: airly2000@... 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  =
  Sent: Friday, May 11, 2001 10:03 AM
    Subject: BlackFortres... 


    C=
hamaleon/ScorPyo/Thyphon/Elecktra:

    Scorpyo continue whinning that he l=
iked to help Chaemlon., and he shouted "Scorpyo LIKES" and shot against a c=
ontainer that have a dangerous virus in gas.

    CHamaleon ran out side th=
e lab and closed the door, leaving Scorpyo inside.  CHamelon looked horrifi=
ed that gas was leaving the lab and and the airtight doors started to close=
, in area 2. Chameleon left area 2  before doors closed  but he fell in sta=
sis lock due the virus.

    Thyphon and ELectra left mes hall and went tow=
ards the high risk labs where Chameleon was.

 is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service. 


        Yahoo! Groups Sponso=
r

rms of Service.
